Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of bull to right (part of haunch, hind legs, underbelly and genitals remaining; added red on hind leg, haunch and belly).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0189) (phase 2)
